trans-unit.source: Provides a templated control that automatically generates the UI to filter table rows for supported column types.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref> class.
Typically you do not use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> class.
Instead, you specify the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> control in page markup, and the control is initialized automatically when the page runs.
Gets or sets the ID of a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter"></xref> control inside the template that is configured to be a filter for a column.
If the ID is not set, the default value for the ID is "DynamicFilter".
The ID of a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter"></xref> control inside the template that is configured to be a filter for a column.
Gets or sets the controls that populate the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref> class.
The ItemTemplate property defines the behavior that is used to populate the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> control with child controls.
The child controls represent the inline templates that are defined on the page.
An object that defines how items in the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref> control are displayed.
Verifies whether the control contains data field filters.
If there are no data field filters, this method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> object to `false`.
This method is called after the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> control is loaded but before it is rendered.
The event data.
Gets the modified query using the current filter value.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFilterExpressionProvider> interface.
The data source query.
The filter.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref> class.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFilterExpressionProvider> interface.
The data source.
